column4: thanks. I was only interested in if adduser overwrites directorys..
hmm, i am running a gnome application from a remote Ubuntu over ssh right now, and i have not edited the ssh configuration file.. and the retard who owns the remote has not done it either, i hope :)
the remote is Ubuntu warty also.  This local machine runs Fedora 3, perhaps that makes it possible?
it's [X11Forwarding yes]  the default in Ubuntu but not in Debian at the moment, as I said above
